## Analysis

```{r load_data}
#| message: false
penguins = read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-07-28/penguins.csv"
)
```

```{r calc_largest_bill}
max_bill_length = penguins %>% 
  filter(species == "Adelie") %>% 
  slice_max(bill_length_mm, n = 1) %>% 
  pull(bill_length_mm)
```
